ptxt.intxrefpoff: HVAC Unit Components:J24B and N32A Model

s1.ptxt: Remove HVAC unit referring to HVAC Unit Removal and Installation:J24B and N32A Model .
Remove evaporator (1) from HVAC unit by disassembling HVAC unit.
Remove evaporator temperature sensor from evaporator.

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: A/C Evaporator Inspection:J24B and N32A Model

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure to install A/C evaporator nothing the following instructions.

item.ptxt: Install evaporator temperature sensor onto evaporator referring to A/C Evaporator Temperature Sensor Removal and Installation:J24B and N32A Model .
